Text.Name: Talk_HeHuan
Text.Hate.1: Don't talk to me. I have germaphobia.
Text.Hate.2: Hurry up. I'm gonna go blind seeing your face.
Text.Normal.0: Oh, hello. What do you want?
Text.Normal.1: Hurry up. I'm gonna take a bath later.
Text.Like.0: Have a look a round, and feel free to choose any disciple you see fit!
Text.Submiss.0: Our best guest, you want to purchase anything? A gift? Or...?
Text.Submiss.1: Come on, look who's here. Girls, come out and welcome our guest!
Text.GiftLike.0: You know I like this? Seems like we have a connection.
Text.GiftLike.1: I'm suddenly interested. This... I'll take it.
Text.LowValueGift.0: Whoever you are, take this away and don't let me see it again.
Text.LowValueGift.2: This thing is a disgrace to our sect's reputation.
